ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds large shrimp - peeled and deveined
¼ cup Old Bay Seasoning TM

cookingTips: Cook shrimp over medium-high heat for 2-3 minutes per side until pink
Do not overcook shrimp as it becomes tough and rubbery
The butter and Old Bay create a flavorful sauce for dipping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand the visual cues for perfectly cooked shrimp and how to avoid overcooking.
